headline: Countdown to Broadridge Financial (BR) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Estimates Beyond Revenue and EPS
summary: Get a deeper insight into the potential performance of Broadridge Financial (BR) for the quarter ended June 2025 by going beyond Wall Street's top-and-bottom-line estimates and examining the estimates for some of its key metrics.

headline: Broadridge Set to Report Q4 Earnings: What's in the Cards?
summary: BR aims for a modest fiscal Q4 EPS gain, but a projected 5.6% revenue dip may test momentum heading into fiscal 2026.
